mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( configId, androidSceneId, customerId, name, imgVideo, description, createTime ) VALUES ( #{configId}, #{androidSceneId}, #{customerId}, #{name}, #{imgVideo}, #{description}, #{createTime} )

INSERT INTO ( configId, androidSceneId, customerId, name, imgVideo, description, createTime, lastUpdateTime ) VALUES
( #{item.configId}, #{item.androidSceneId}, #{item.customerId}, #{item.name}, #{item.imgVideo}, #{item.description}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.lastUpdateTime} )
